name: SmiSmpsIO
brief:
SMPS (Stochastic MPS) file format reader and writer

SmiSmpsIO extends CoinMpsIO to read/write the industry-standard SMPS
format for stochastic programming problems.

**SMPS File Format (3 files):**
- {name}.core: Core LP in MPS format (deterministic base problem)
- {name}.time: Stage assignments (PERIODS section maps rows/cols to stages)
- {name}.stoch: Stochastic data (SCENARIOS or INDEP sections)

**SmiSectionType Enum:**
- SMI_TIME_SECTION: PERIODS in time file
- SMI_SCENARIOS_SECTION: SCENARIOS in stoch file
- SMI_INDEPENDENT_SECTION: INDEP in stoch file

**SmiSmpsType Enum:**
- SMI_SC_CARD: SC card (scenario definition)
- SMI_BL_CARD: BL card (branch location)
- SMI_SMPS_COMBINE_ADD/REPLACE: Data combination rules

**SmiSmpsCardReader Class:**
Extends CoinMpsCardReader for SMPS-specific parsing:
- periodName(): Stage name from time file
- scenarioNew/Anc(): Scenario branching info
- getProb(): Scenario probability

**Key Methods:**
- readTimeFile(): Parse stage assignments
- readStochFile(): Parse stochastic data
- writeSmps(): Output SMPS files
see: SmiScnData.hpp for SmiCoreData created from core file
